peregrine.io.chunk
Interface ChunkWriter

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, SequenceWriter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultChunkWriter, DefaultPartitionWriter
public interface ChunkWriter
extends java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, SequenceWriter

Write key/values to chunks.
